title: How to make a rap voice for myself - Quora

response.answer_text: A rap voice should be natural like a conversation so the people will gravitate to you sound with a pleased ear. Your sound should match how you look and move.  I would like you to check out this podcast on artist development when you can. There is great value with this podcast. Ep # 10 Are You A Brand or An Artist? #foxholeSecrets About Revenue Streams http://traffic.libsyn.com/foxhole360/ep_10-Brand-or-Artist.mp3

First thing is first, find a team! Find a producers, engineer, and some people that will help you promote. Then create at least 8 songs with different vibes and you and your team push them all at the same time. Which ever song gets the most attention, you have your sounds. Now make more music like that and watch your fan base grow!
